AnswerDetail: Hi there. They are all in the Regular Maxi Length.

Hi! You'll want to order according to your waist to hem measurement while wearing the shoes you plan to have on at the wedding. If you are right at or just over 41 inches, it may be best to order the Regular Maxi Length and have a seamstress hem it to your exact measurement!
Hi there. Yes! They are all sent in the Regular Maxi Length.
Hi! All of our items are machine washable on a cool gentle cycle with very little detergent! You will then want to hang the dress to dry, and use a handheld steamer to get any wrinkles out.!
